name: Two Ships
description: This game is being submitted as part of the United Game Jam. The game is a space shoot em up with endless waves.  Enemies get tougher each wave. The main mechanic of the game is the players control of two ships. The laser assets in the game were made by myself before the jam. All other assets I used were made by myself. For the art I used Piskel. For sounds I used sfxr. The game was made with the Unity Engine.
